com.iota.iri.service.snapshot

Interface SnapshotStateDiff

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SnapshotStateDiffImpl

    public interface SnapshotStateDiff
    An immutable collection of balance changes that can be used to modify the ledger state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<Hash,java.lang.Long> getBalanceChanges()
      The Map returned by this method is a copy which guarantees the immutability of this object.
      boolean isConsistent()
      Checks if the balance changes are consistent, which means that the sum of all changes is exactly zero.

    • Method Detail

      • getBalanceChanges

        java.util.Map<Hash,java.lang.Long> getBalanceChanges()
        The Map returned by this method is a copy which guarantees the immutability of this object.
        Returns:
        the balance changes associated to their address hash

      • isConsistent

        boolean isConsistent()
        Checks if the balance changes are consistent, which means that the sum of all changes is exactly zero.
        Returns:
        true if the sum of all balances is zero
